name: Boxxy Lite - 8 level mini game
description:
This is a small puzzle game where you control boxxy, a small blue character making his way through different challenges. He can pick up, throw, and push boxes to make his way to the heart at the end and finish the level. More levels will be coming in the near future.

Controls:

WASD to move.
Space to jump
E to pick up and throw boxes.
ESC to Pause

Notes-
uses EasyUI Package - https://chrisashtear.itch.io/easy-ui-builder
